r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d:
A PEAR-ified version of Useful Inc's XML-RPC for PHP.
It has support for HTTP/HTTPS transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: * Improve timeout handling for situations where connection to server is made but no response is not received in time. Accomplished via stream_set_timeout(). Request 3963. * Add Fault Code 6: "The requested method didn't return an XML_RPC_Response object." Request 4032. * Add the createServerPayload() and createServerHeaders() methods and the $server_payload and $server_headers properties. Request 3121. * As in earlier versions, if the $serviceNow parameter to XML_RPC_Server() is 0, no data will be returned, but now the new $server_payload and $server_headers properties will be set. * Convert the parser handle to an integer before using it as an index for $XML_RPC_xh[$parser]. Reduces E_STRICT notices. Bug 3782. * Add createHeaders() method and $headers property to XML_RPC_Client to make testing easier.
